docstrings:
* A service interface for bundles that want to create a Vaadin application. * These services should be registered with the {@link #SERVICE_PROPERY_ALIAS} * to the path where the application should reside. *

* Normally in Vaadin the instances are created by Vaadin but in this case the * application can setup the instances. * * @param * the UI type this application supports

* Return the class to be used for the UI. This class can contain the @Theme annotation 
	 * @return the class

* Create an instance for a new session. This class must extend the class returned from {@link #getUIClass()}
	 * 
	 * @param event the create event
	 * @return
